title: Understanding Psychological Dependence
text: Psychological dependence refers to the emotional and mental processes associated with the development of, and recovery from, a substance use disorder.

title: Key Characteristics of Psychological Dependence
text: It involves emotional and mental preoccupation with the substance, often leading to cravings and compulsive use.

hintAnswer: the emotional developments and changes that accompany substance misuse
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes psychological dependence?
choices: a disturbance in behavior or mental function during or after the consumption of a substance
the process of getting used to doing something—such as using a substance—and then not wanting to stop
when the lack of the substance causes physical symptoms
the emotional developments and changes that accompany substance misuse
